languages.text: {n}После долгой паузы Инцендия неохотно отвечает:{/n} "Я ищу прощения. Я совершила слишком много такого, что уже не загладить и не исправить. Я надеюсь... Проклятье, {name}, я надеюсь, что там, во мраке, мне предоставится шанс достойно умереть и хотя бы немного оправдать себя".

{n}After a long pause, Incendia says reluctantly,{/n} "I seek forgiveness. I did far too many things that cannot be expiated or corrected. I hope... blast it, {name}, I hope that out there, in the darkness, I shall get a chance to die with dignity and thus absolve myself of even some small portion of my wrongdoing."
languages.original_text: {n}После долгой паузы Инцендия неохотно отвечает:{/n} "Я ищу прощения. Я совершила слишком много такого, что уже не загладить и не исправить. Я надеюсь... Проклятье, {name}, я надеюсь, что там, во мраке, мне предоставится шанс достойно умереть и хотя бы немного оправдать себя".

traits.locale_text: {n}After a long pause, Incendia says reluctantly,{/n} "I seek forgiveness. I did far too many things that cannot be expiated or corrected. I hope... blast it, {name}, I hope that out there, in the darkness, I will get a chance to die with dignity and thus absolve myself of a pitiful share of my wrongs."

{n}After a long pause, Incendia says reluctantly,{/n} "I seek forgiveness. I did far too many things that cannot be expiated or corrected. I hope... blast it, {name}, I hope that out there, in the darkness, I will get a chance to die with dignity and thus absolve myself of a pitiful share of my wrongs."

{n}After a long pause, Incendia says reluctantly,{/n} "I seek forgiveness. I did far too many things that cannot be expiated or corrected. I hope... blast it, {name}, I hope that out there, in the darkness, I shall get a chance to die with dignity and thus absolve myself of even some small portion of my wrongdoing."

{n}After a long pause, Incendia says reluctantly,{/n} "I seek forgiveness. I did far too many things that cannot be expiated or corrected. I hope... blast it, {name}, I hope that out there, in the darkness, I shall get a chance to die with dignity and thus absolve myself of even some small portion of my wrongdoing."

{n}After a long pause, Incendia says reluctantly,{/n} "I seek forgiveness. I did far too many things that cannot be expiated or corrected. I hope... blast it, {name}, I hope that out there, in the darkness, I shall get a chance to die with dignity and thus absolve myself of even some small portion of my wrongdoing."

languages.text: {n}Nach einer langen Pause erklärt Incendia zögerlich: {/n}"Ich suche Vergebung. Ich habe zu viele Dinge getan, die nicht gesühnt oder korrigiert werden können. Ich hoffe ... ach, verdammt, {name}, ich hoffe, dass ich dort draußen in der Dunkelheit eine Chance bekomme, in Würde zu sterben, um mich von einem kleinen Teil meiner Verfehlungen reinzuwaschen."
languages.original_text: {n}After a long pause, Incendia says reluctantly,{/n} "I seek forgiveness. I did far too many things that cannot be expiated or corrected. I hope... blast it, {name}, I hope that out there, in the darkness, I shall get a chance to die with dignity and thus absolve myself of even some small portion of my wrongdoing."

traits.locale_text: {n}Nach einer langen Pause erklärt Incendia zögerlich: {/n}"Ich suche Vergebung. Ich habe zu viele Dinge getan, die nicht gesühnt oder korrigiert werden können. Ich hoffe ... ach, verdammt, {name}, ich hoffe, dass ich dort draußen in der Dunkelheit eine Chance bekomme, in Würde zu sterben, um mich von einem kleinen Teil meiner Verfehlungen reinzuwaschen."

languages.text: {n}Après un long silence, Incendia répond du bout des lèvres :{/n} « J'aspire au pardon. J'ai commis bien trop d'atrocités au-delà de toute rédemption ou réparation. J'espère... Bon sang, {name}, là-bas, dans les ténèbres, j'espère avoir l'occasion de mourir dignement et de m'absoudre ce faisant d'une infime partie de mes crimes. »
languages.original_text: {n}After a long pause, Incendia says reluctantly,{/n} "I seek forgiveness. I did far too many things that cannot be expiated or corrected. I hope... blast it, {name}, I hope that out there, in the darkness, I shall get a chance to die with dignity and thus absolve myself of even some small portion of my wrongdoing."

traits.locale_text: {n}Après un long silence, Incendia répond du bout des lèvres :{/n} « J'aspire au pardon. J'ai commis bien trop d'atrocités au-delà de toute rédemption ou réparation. J'espère... Bon sang, {name}, là-bas, dans les ténèbres, j'espère avoir l'occasion de mourir dignement et de m'absoudre ce faisant d'une infime partie de mes crimes. »

languages.text: {n}長い沈黙の後、インセンディアはためらいがちに口を開いた。{/n}「私は赦しを求めている。私は償うことも修正することもできないようなことを、あまりにも多く為してきた。私は…壊したいのだ、{name}。どこか、暗闇の中で、尊厳と共に死ぬ機会を得て、自分の犯した過ちのほんの一部でもいいから赦されることを願っているのだ」
languages.original_text: {n}After a long pause, Incendia says reluctantly,{/n} "I seek forgiveness. I did far too many things that cannot be expiated or corrected. I hope... blast it, {name}, I hope that out there, in the darkness, I shall get a chance to die with dignity and thus absolve myself of even some small portion of my wrongdoing."

traits.locale_text: {n}長い沈黙の後、インセンディアはためらいがちに口を開いた。{/n}「私は赦しを求めている。私は償うことも修正することもできないようなことを、あまりにも多く為してきた。私は…壊したいのだ、{name}。どこか、暗闇の中で、尊厳と共に死ぬ機会を得て、自分の犯した過ちのほんの一部でもいいから赦されることを願っているのだ」

languages.text: {n}Tras una larga pausa, Incendia dice con reluctancia:{/n} «Busco el perdón. Cometí demasiados actos imposibles de expiar o corregir. Espero... maldita sea, {name}, espero que ahí fuera, en la oscuridad, pueda tener la oportunidad de morir con dignidad y absolverme así de al menos una pequeña parte de mis errores».
languages.original_text: {n}After a long pause, Incendia says reluctantly,{/n} "I seek forgiveness. I did far too many things that cannot be expiated or corrected. I hope... blast it, {name}, I hope that out there, in the darkness, I shall get a chance to die with dignity and thus absolve myself of even some small portion of my wrongdoing."

traits.locale_text: {n}Tras una larga pausa, Incendia dice con reluctancia:{/n} «Busco el perdón. Cometí demasiados actos imposibles de expiar o corregir. Espero... maldita sea, {name}, espero que ahí fuera, en la oscuridad, pueda tener la oportunidad de morir con dignidad y absolverme así de al menos una pequeña parte de mis errores».

languages.text: {n}因森蒂娅沉默了许久，最终不情愿地开了口。{/n}“我渴望得到宽恕。我做了太多无法原谅、无法弥补的事情，我希望……真该死，{name}，我希望我能在这里，在这片黑暗之中，带着尊严面对死亡，这样至少能为我一小部分错误赎罪。”
languages.original_text: {n}After a long pause, Incendia says reluctantly,{/n} "I seek forgiveness. I did far too many things that cannot be expiated or corrected. I hope... blast it, {name}, I hope that out there, in the darkness, I shall get a chance to die with dignity and thus absolve myself of even some small portion of my wrongdoing."

traits.locale_text: {n}因森蒂娅沉默了许久，最终不情愿地开了口。{/n}“我渴望得到宽恕。我做了太多无法原谅、无法弥补的事情，我希望……真该死，{name}，我希望我能在这里，在这片黑暗之中，带着尊严面对死亡，这样至少能为我一小部分错误赎罪。”

languages.text: {n}Uzun bir duraksamanın ardından İncendia, zoraki bir şekilde konuşuyor.{/n} "Af arayışındayım. Telafi edilemeyecek veya düzeltilemeyecek sayısız şey yaptım. Umuyorum ki... Kahretsin {name}, umuyorum ki karanlığın içinde onurlu bir şekilde ölme şansı bulurum ve böylece yaptığım yanlışların en azından küçük bir kısmının kefaretini ödeyebilirim."
languages.original_text: {n}After a long pause, Incendia says reluctantly,{/n} "I seek forgiveness. I did far too many things that cannot be expiated or corrected. I hope... blast it, {name}, I hope that out there, in the darkness, I shall get a chance to die with dignity and thus absolve myself of even some small portion of my wrongdoing."
